equipment.default: # Heading example  - This text editor uses markdown which is then rendered into HTML on the site.  - To organize groups of information, use a hashtag as done above to create a heading.  - Use a dash followed by a space to create a list of items.     - Use an indented dash followed by a space to create a nested list item.    - This is another nested list items.  # Another heading - Only headings, lists, and inner lists as demonstrated and explained above currently render correctly onto the site.
